description: Delete an existing task. User must own the task. Task is permanently removed from database.

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user deleting the task

task_id.description: ID of the task to delete

error_cases.condition: task_id is missing or not an integer
task_id does not exist or user does not own task
error_cases.error: Task not found or access denied

notes.destructive: This operation is not idempotent. Deleting an already-deleted task returns an error.
notes.data_loss: Deleted tasks cannot be recovered. No soft delete or archiving.

examples.name: Attempt to delete already-deleted task
examples.error: Task not found or access denied
